price: Mu mitima yabo harimo uburwayi (bwo gushidikanya n’uburyarya), bityo Allah yarabubongereye; kandi bazahanishwa ibihano bibabaza kubera ko barangwaga no kubeshya.
arabic: فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٞ فَزَادَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ مَرَضٗاۖ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمُۢ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡذِبُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: fī qulūbihim maraḍun fazādahumu al-lahu maraḍan walahum ʿadhābun alīmun bimā kānū yakdhibūna
